name: vestibule
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
formal a small room just inside the outer door of a public building where you can leave your coat, etc.: I'll wait for you in the vestibule.
US a small closed area on the front of a house Synonym
porch US
SondraP/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
medical
  specialized an empty space in the body that is an entrance to a passage or another space: the nasal vestibule

Add to word list
a room just inside a house or building, through which you enter the building: In the school’s vestibule is a sign reading, "Enter here and find a friend." You can hang your coat in the vestibule.
